title: Premiere: Erik Hassle – Talk About It (Deebs Remix)
content:
Erik Hassle’s aggressive (and AMAZING) comeback track, Talk About It, has seen some impressive remixes from ASTR and BASECAMP, but none have tamed the track quite like Deebs.

The Toronto-based producer’s organ synths, distorted vocals and vibrating bass create a cold tension that too well matches Hassle’s frustration. “Baby, I don’t want to think about it, no. Just let me know what you would call this thing between us.” Its impressive when a remix properly represents both artists without losing the original intention of a track. Homerun for a new side of dubstep here.

Exciting things to come for Erik Hassle in 2014. I’m quite sure of it.
